quotes.message: Like anyone else, there are days I feel beautiful and days I don't, and when I don't, I do something about it.
quotes.name: Cheryl Tiegs

quotes.message: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical.
quotes.name: Sophia Loren

quotes.message: I feel beautiful when I'm at peace with myself. When I'm serene, when I'm a good person, when I've been considerate of others.
quotes.name: Elle Macpherson

quotes.message: It's not vanity to feel you have a right to be beautiful. Women are taught to feel we're not good enough, that we must live up to someone else's standards. But my aim is to cherish myself as I am.
quotes.name: Elle Mcpherson

quotes.message: And barefoot or first thing in the morning, I feel beautiful. Because I feel like me. I didn't always feel that way, but I feel that way now. When somebody just loves you, and when you make somebody happy, when your presence seems to make them happy, you suddenly feel like the most beautiful person in the world.
quotes.name: Angelina Jolie

quotes.message: Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror. But you are eternity and you are the mirror.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Although beauty may be in the eye of the beholder, the feeling of being beautiful exists solely in the mind of the beheld.
quotes.name: Martha Beck

quotes.message: It's important to feel beautiful; it's political to feel beautiful.
quotes.name: Margaret Cho

quotes.message: I know now that it's really important to feel beautiful. There is a power to that.
quotes.name: Lana Del Rey

quotes.message: But looking beautiful isn't, I think, as important as feeling beautiful.
quotes.name: Julia Quinn

quotes.message: You've got to get up every morning with a smile on your face . And show the world all the love in your heart . Then people gonna treat you better . You're gonna find, yes you will . That you're beautiful as you feel.
quotes.name: Carole King

quotes.message: I don't look my best when I wake up. But, I do feel beautiful when I'm tired and happy and I've had a good laugh and a glass of champagne.
quotes.name: Maya Rudolph

quotes.message: When I lay my head on the pillow at night I can say I was a decent person today. That's when I feel beautiful.
quotes.name: Drew Barrymore

quotes.message: Nothing makes a woman more beautiful than the belief that she is beautiful.
quotes.name: Rashida Jones

quotes.message: You need to feel beautiful on your own before a guy can make you feel beautiful, because it wont be a healthy relationship.
quotes.name: Megan Park

quotes.message: I want to feel beautiful, like when he told me I was.
quotes.name: Pamela L. Ritchie

quotes.message: You should feel beautiful and you should feel safe. What you surround yourself with should bring you peace of mind and peace of spirit.
quotes.name: Stacy London

quotes.message: I never think, Oh, I'm so beautiful. To me, feeling happy is more important.
quotes.name: Leslie Bibb

quotes.message: I feel most beautiful at night, when I take my makeup off and it's just me.
quotes.name: Ashley Greene

quotes.message: I believe that how you feel is very important to how you look - that healthy equals beautiful.
quotes.name: Victoria Principal

quotes.message: Personally, I don't ever want to depend on makeup to feel beautiful.
quotes.name: Lupita Nyong'o

quotes.message: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don't need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line.
quotes.name: Lucille Ball

quotes.message: Beauty does not always feel beautiful.
quotes.name: Tynee Williams

quotes.message: Looking beautiful starts by feeling beautiful.
quotes.name: Tresors De Luxe

quotes.message: The first question I ask myself when something doesn't seem to be beautiful is why do I feel it's not beautiful? And very shortly you discover there is no reason.
quotes.name: John Cage

quotes.message: Confidence is the ability to feel beautiful without needing someone to tell you.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Despite the message of self-doubt and inadequacy hammered home by the beauty industry, the truth is simple: If you feel gorgeous, you'll look gorgeous.
quotes.name: Anita Roddick

quotes.message: Beauty can't amse you, but brainwork— reading, writing, thinking— can.
quotes.name: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.message: I am so beautiful, sometimes people weep when they see me. And it has nothing to do with what I look like really, it is just that I gave myself the power to say that I am beautiful, and if I can do that, maybe there is hope for them, too. And the great divide between the beautiful and the ugly will cease to be. Because we are all what we choose.
quotes.name: Margaret Cho

quotes.message: I was sweaty, and my hair was matted all over the place. And I was happy and hot and accomplishing a lot and running around, and I could feel my heart beating, and I felt beautiful.
quotes.name: Angelina Jolie

quotes.message: Taught from infancy that beauty is woman's sceptre, the mind shapes itself to the body, and roaming round its gilt cage, only seeks to adorn its prison.
quotes.name: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.message: I think that the longer I look good, the better gay men feel.
quotes.name: Cher

quotes.message: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
quotes.name: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.message: There is a certain age when a woman must be beautiful to be loved, and then there comes a time when she must be loved to be beautiful.
quotes.name: Francoise Sagan

quotes.message: Now that I'm pregnant I feel beautiful for the first time in my life.
quotes.name: Karen Alexander

quotes.message: Remind yourself everyday that you are beautiful, whether you struggle to believe that or you already know.
quotes.name: Becca Anderson

quotes.message: I think I'm a very pretty girl. I'm never going to pretend to think otherwise.
quotes.name: Milla Jovovich

quotes.message: I am comfortable in my clothes. I am naturally beautiful. I recognize that I have true beauty.
quotes.name: Becca Anderson

quotes.message: I see myself as sexy. If you are comfortable with it, it can be very classy and appealing.
quotes.name: Aaliyah

quotes.message: I am healthy and attractive. I am free of negativity. I see myself as beautiful.
quotes.name: Becca Anderson

quotes.message: Beauty is about being comfortable in your own skin . It's about knowing and accepting who you are.
quotes.name: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.message: Beauty as we feel it is something indescribable: what is or what it means can never be said.
quotes.name: George Santayana

quotes.message: Beauty is momentary in he mind— . The fitful tracing of a portal; . But in the flesh it is immortal; . The body dies; the body;s beauty lives.
quotes.name: Wallace Stevens

quotes.message: Research shows the way someone feels about their looks has a far greater effect on their quality of life than how they actually look.
quotes.name: Jessamy Hibberd

quotes.message: Recognising this difference (how you look versus how you feel about how you look) is the first step to feeling more beautiful.
quotes.name: Jessamy Hibberd

quotes.message: What really makes me feel beautiful is that I can finally feel the powerful emotion of love.
quotes.name: Nancy Ostrov

quotes.message: All that matters to me now is that people see me as a beautiful woman, and for the first time in my life, I feel beautiful.
quotes.name: Nancy Ostrov

quotes.message: What we don't get is no one can make us feel beautiful, unless we know and we feel that we are.
quotes.name: Rosilia A. Albert

quotes.message: I'm beautiful because I can feel it, I can taste it, I can smell it. It's all over me. I have a big heart, a beautiful heart. Anyone that comes in contact with me will always feel my beauty.
quotes.name: Rosilia A. Albert

quotes.message: There is nothing to do except to be just who you are. You have the right to feel beautiful and enjoy it.
quotes.name: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.message: What matters is how you feel inside, because feeling beautiful on the inside is key to looking good.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: I think that glamour is about confidence. I think however somebody feels beautiful, that's glamour.
quotes.name: Kate Upton

quotes.message: As a woman, I believe you have to embrace your body, and feel beautiful both inside and out.
quotes.name: Tamara Ecclestone

quotes.message: Beauty is really all about confidence. If you feel beautiful, then you are beautiful.
quotes.name: Sofia Vergara

quotes.message: 'You can't be beautiful,' Brandy says about a thousand times, 'until you feel beautiful.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: I contend that every woman has the right to feel beautiful, no matter how scrambled her features, or how indifferent her features.
quotes.name: Marie Dressler
